# Chocolate Zucchini Bread

## Ingredients

* 3 eggs
* 2 cups sugar
* 1 cup salad oil (??)
* 2 oz unsweetened chocolate cooking bars, melted
* or 0.75 cups unsweetened cocoa
* 1 tsp baking soda
* 0.5 tsp baking powder
* 1 tsp vanilla
* 2 cups grated zucchini
* 3 cups flour
* 1 tsp cinnamon
* 1 cup choped nuts

## Instructions

Beat the eggs until lemon colored. Beat in sugar, oil, chocolate, vanila, and zucchini. Sift flour, cinnamon, baking powdr, and baking soda and add to the egg mixture. Mix thoroughly, add nuts. Pour into greased bread pans. Bake at 350&deg;F for 50-60 minutes (baking time depends on size of the bread pans).
